abstract: Islamic State confirms that its most notorious executioner Mohammed Emwazi, known as Jihadi John, was killed in 2015 during airstrike in northern Syria.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The most recent issue of the militant group’s online publication, Dabiq, included a eulogy for Mohammed Emwazi, a British citizen.
lead_paragraph: The most recent issue of the militant group’s online publication, Dabiq, included a eulogy for Mohammed Emwazi, a British citizen.
